Created with a blend of roasted brown peanuts, our Crunchy Peanut Butter is all-natural and a great source of protein — ideal for supporting your training and curbing your cravings.

Plus, it’s free from added salt, sugar, palm oil, and preservatives, while being packed with fibre and the essential nutrients vitamin E and magnesium, this super-nutritious snack is the sweet and simple way to keep your training on track.

  • Delicious and all-natural
  • Source of protein
  • Reduces tiredness and fatigue3
  • Free from added salt, sugar, and palm oil

Nutritional information may vary depending on flavour.

Our Crunchy Peanut Butter is perfect for those who love a textured spread. It's a natural source of protein, helping to build and maintain your muscles, that’s super-important whatever your fitness goals.1

This peanut butter is also a great source of magnesium, which helps to support your bones,3 and reduces tiredness and fatigue2 — so you can power through your training. Magnesium also plays an important role in supporting your metabolism,4 and muscle function.5

1. Protein contributes to the growth and maintenance of muscle mass.

2. Magnesium contributes to a reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

3. Magnesium contributes to the maintenance of normal bones.

4. Magnesium contributes to normal energy-yielding metabolism.

5. Magnesium contributes to normal muscle function.

Ideal for use as a spread or cooking agent. Some separation of oil is natural, simply stir back in.

Peanut that ROCKS

This is the best peanut butter I've ever tasted. I don't know what is the recipe guys. ( I know it's written on the label... 100% peanut ). But this is better than any bio/extra butter. Great for sandwiches, protein bomb meals, and my favourite... teaspoon, standing in the kitchen with open fridge door.

Teaspoon

If your looking to strengthen your jaw, make all kindz of jaw gainz or just looking for a cheap effective jaw workout I would definetly recommend this product!

Was this helpful?

The BEST STUFF ever!!!

I love this peanut butter...I have this every day (35g), on its own and I LOVE LOVE LOVE it!! Please MyProtein, don't ever stop stocking this item. It's great for my LCHF healthy eating lifestyle and I just can't get enough of it. In fact, one recent pot only lasted me 10 days recently(oops, just couldn't keep my face out of the tub!!) so I've stocked up and bought extra!!! It's also great in my LCHF baking that I do as well as adding it to my protein shakes and yoghurt desserts
Goes Well With:
Teaspoon - on the rock!! Protein shakes - chocolate flavour especially. On Toast In low carb chocolate muffins - my favourite!!! Oh, and with celery sticks/raw peppers and carrot/cucumber sticks

23/04/18 by Michelle
Verified Purchase

Was this helpful?

Yes (19) No (2)

Great product, too much packaging!!

This is a great product, its tasty and easy to spread, I  n take it to work and have it with apple slices as a snack.  My big issue is the amount of packaging that MyProtein use to get it to me...it arrived in a plastic tub, wrapped in plastic sink wrap, in a box thats placed in another box with a load of plastic bubble wrap! Thats 5 pieces of waste for one tub of peanut butter. Like many people I take the impact on the environment very seriously when making buying decisions, sadly that consideration puts this product a long way down my shopping list!!
Goes Well With:
Fruit slices

Fantastic!

Good price + good taste + good size! What else needed? It's my second time when I ordered it and can give one advice: if by arrival peanut butter is more like liquid by consistency, keep it in fridge overnight. In the morning you'll see spreadable mass ready to go on toast. You're welcome ;)

09/06/18 by Eduardo

Great value with discount, great product

Bought this to help with weight gain, I was honestly expecting it nice and sweet right out of the tub but all you get is the pure blended peanuts. Then again I just saw in the reviews and reminded myself its all natural sugars no additives. I've mixed this with the weight gainer shake and turns out pretty nice, I was previously using the peanut butter powder but they both mix in well with the powders. I've also tried the peanut butter with the myprotein pancakes, also tastes nice but I have had to add golden syrup and sprinkle a little sugar for the sweet tooth! Great product tho!
Goes Well With:
Protein pancakes, weight gainer powder shake

Awesome

I’m a Peanut Butter lover and always try to find the healthiest versions at the supermarket. When I saw this one and decided to give it a go I had no clue it was going to be this good. From the texture to the taste, it’s the best I’ve tried, even my girlfriend who wasn’t a PB fan before it now is a much of a fan as me, if not more. 100% recommended!
